body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, soldier. Kentucky native. Son of John Lawson and Mary A. Lawson. Resident of Mercer County in 1850. Resident of Mercer County in 1860. Served in the Mercer County State Guard as from December 7, 1864 until April 2, 1865. Reported as deserted on April 2, 1865.
